text: This is a list of all the queens consort of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan. No woman is allowed to be a queen regnant. Born as Consort years Spouse Musbah bint Nasser 1946–1951 Abdullah I Zein al-Sharaf Talal 1951–1952 Talal Dina bint 'Abdu'l-Hamid 1955–1957 Hussein Antoinette Avril Gardiner 1961–1971 Hussein Alia Baha Ad-Din Touqan 1971–1977 Hussein Lisa Najeeb Halaby 1978–1999 Hussein Rania al-Yassin 1999–present Abdullah II == References == * consorts
title: List of Jordanian consorts
